main.name: Hello, I'm Fatan Aminullah
main.bio: My name is Fatan Aminullah, i'm a 20 years old Software Developer. Now i'm working at PT. Antikode Desain Eksperensia as a Frontend Developer. I'm using ReactJS and NextJS to build a Web Application and React Native to build a Mobile Application. I started my journey as a Professional Programmer in 2019, but I've started introducing myself to programming since I was in junior high school
main.contactMessage: Want to discuss something? Feel free to contact me!

projects.title: IKI Aku
projects.description: IKI Aku is an application to ease you to transfers your money to all banks in Indonesia safely. Transaction can be done anytime, anywhere. With a strong partnership with local banks in Taiwan, IKI Aku provides remittance service for foreign workers to send money to their relatives in Indonesia.
